Would i reccomend this game? In short yes because its something different to try. Just like most games there are bugs and glitches that can make the game unfair or not satisfying... But I have been working with the kinks of this game for the past year. There have been good patches with more pros than cons. there have also been patches with opposite effect as well. through thick in thin I haven't given up on the game yet. If you stumble across this game and are a fan of horror, or just have 4 friends lookings for something to pass the time? Try Dead by Daylight!

 The never ending grind of leveling up your characters will seem boring and tedious at frist becasue of the random items and perks given to you by the Entity but thats what makes the game special in my eyes. What gift does the Entity think you deserve today? Will Lady Luck be on your side or will you just stock up 50 brown med kits without and healing add-ons? you take whats given to you and adapt to the playstyle given to you.

Each character has their own 3 unique perks that fit the role they are given with. Ex is that the healer of the group Claudette revolves around the idea of taking whaat healing items you have and makin them better! there are guides on the steam forums you can read for better detail. 

Killers have their own little querks and abilities making you adapt to not only your playstyle but thiers as well! you may fight the same killer but not the same person playing as the killer... Depending on your rank. if you are rank 1 im sorry but you are limited to the same few 100 people that hit Rank 1 every season.

Whether you play as killer and feed your dark desire to hunt down the small and helpless survivors, or try to play with a group of you and 3 friends as survivors constantly running around trying to get objectives done or saving each other from the killers grasps i can assure you that you will have fun with this game! :D (when it works)

Good luck out in the Fog new faces and old

This game can definetly be very enjoyable. I have over two hundred hours on dead by daylight, and I think ten dollars was well worth all that gameplay. Even twenty would have been worth it. The game does not get old, and the developers are regulrly updating it and adding new DLC, not all of the DLC needing to be purchased. They added recently a free survivor and killer for all players, and may be adding another two. The game is fun, it may not be perfect, but with some time and learning the complaints about trolling team mates or a trolling killer becomes irrelevant because individual skill is rewarded in this game, not just team effort. If you are good, you will rank up, and go with other players who care enough about the game not to troll themselves. And if you play casually, then it'll still be fun messing around at the lower ranks, and you will surely get plenty of serious games even if you are the lowest possible rank. I believe this game is more than worth it for a sale price, and still worth it for full price. I can't see it getting old any time soon, and even if it did, 100+ hours is more than some 60 dollar games can provide you. 

As for the DLC being costly, it also goes on sale regularly. I have every DLC in the game up to date and my total money spent is still only 40 dollars. (Same price as the less enjoyable Friday the 13th.) Sale or not, the game is well worth your money. Every game is different, you always need to adapt to the new killer and their playstyle, which changes depending on their perks and even their personality. You will get mad, and you will definitely get annoyed, but those close games feel really good to win. Buy this game, you won't regret it.

Finally, on the pay to win claims, I can't deny that the killers you pay for can often be very strong, but the killer with the highest winrate is free, and so is the 3rd highest win rate killer. In the end, the killer with the lowest winrate can still be very strong if played correctly. It all comes down to the player. Not to bash the people who say this is pay to win, but often times they're just salty that they lost a lot of games to the new DLC killer. Can't blame them since I get salty too, but you learn to adapt, which is the main idea of this game. You can cry and keep losing, or suck it up and learn how to win.

终于等到打骨折，嘻嘻！毫不犹豫的就入手拉，开始的时候还一脸懵，根本不知道自己要干嘛，但是还好凭借我多年的类似游戏经验，轻手轻脚的悄悄走，亲王绕柱，18般武艺，成功第一次逃脱。虽然坑爹的被屠夫抓单了4次，但是4次我都跑掉了（左右晃），估计屠夫同志快气死了，比小强还小强，活着的泥鳅~ 美滋滋！然后果断买了巫妖老婆婆，太开心了，我还是适合杀人~几乎都是全kill，开心~

最后！！
还看？别看了！！赶紧入手吧，趁着打骨折期间、你值得拥有！
（嘻嘻，加好友一起玩吧。我还是萌新，希望有大腿抱着~么么哒）

A simple review: 

Pros :) 
- Gameplay unlike no other 
- Non Toxic community 
- Interesting mechanics and creative ways to outplay people 
- Insane adrenaline levels when the killer finds you!
- Developers care and update regularly to balance the game

Cons :( 
- Can be a bit annoying when the killer camps 
- Playing with friends is not the most ideal thing to do because once someone dies, he has to wait for the others to finish the game and cannot even spectate :(

Спустя большое количество часов проведенных в этой игре я могу с полной уверенностью сказать, что игра действительно хороша. Да, возможно прошло много лет с момента её выхода и наверняка, кто её хотел купить - он её купил. Но я пишу это сугубо для себя, как эдакие мысли в слух. В игре есть свои недостатки, такие как: отвратительные хитбоксы, плохая оптимизация, посредственная графика, плохое соединение с игрой - в общем в игре проблемы технического характера. Но с другой стороны игра имеет огромное количество преимуществ : лор, тактический геймплей, прогресс по ходу игры, внутри игровой лор (весьма добротный) - все эти плюсы ( и многие другие) нивелируют минусы представленные выше. Я мог бы долго распинаться по этому поводу и размышлять "что  плохо, что нет?". но скажу так. Игра хороша для тех, кто хочет атмосферно и весело провести время с друзьями, либо в одиночку. Она Вас затянет на многие часы, если Вы фанат такого жанра

Talking about dead by daylight, we are talking about a unique game. A unique, fun, infuriating and soemtimes crazy driving game. First of all, the game in general is fun, and the whole idea of things happening in it is nice...BUT. If only they would have done that "PRETTY GOOD JOB SO FAR" better, the game would have been way more enjoyable to play. All in all, we have facecamping, bodyblocking, getting stuck in the trees, searching a game for 30 minutes and then getting kicked and many more problems. In average, i could say the game is pretty balanced, though some killers seem like cancer to play against, but maybe its just me... Now i know what most people think though: "Ban the facecampers!Hooray bodyblockers", but thats just 1 side of the coin. On the other one, both should be fixed. Facecamping is not realistic, not fair and all, but think about bodyblocking. It just sounds stupid aswell. A giant human is not able to step over ot push a small crouching dwight away?Really?That always wondered me. Now, talking about the community, its pretty nice. I mean...Comparing it to CSGO salty russian community, this seems like heaven...Killers complain about all the palletlooping stuff and such like infinite, but i would say this is normal, this is after all just a survivor, whom can only run, and its up to him, how to do that, you are the killing machine here. Ranking system...Oh well, how many times have i gotten rank 20 killers/survivors, when im rank 4(both survivor and killer) myself. 
         Here is my conclusion: the game is good and fun, but could have been better if devs fix all those annoying bugs and facecamping/bodyblocking... So far, i give Dead by daylight a 7/10 and i hope it gets better with devs working.

재밌다 확실히 재밌긴 재밌다

아무것도 모를 저랭때 생존자를 하면 심장소리만 들려도 숨으면서 오줌을 쌀 수 있다

뒤 한번 쳐다보지도 못하고 사바나의 치타마냥 일직선으로 뛰다가 갈고리에 걸려 엔티티한테 저녁밥으로 100번쯤 바쳐지고 나면

슬슬 어떻게 해야 살인마새끼를 좀 더 빡치게 할 수 있나를 생각한다

이 정도 생각할 수 있는 랭크쯤 되면 5~8랭 사이일텐데 이젠 진짜로 이 게임이 공포게임이 아니라 사실 술래잡기게임이라는걸 느끼게 된다

그리고 난 이때가 가장 재밌으면서도 개같았다

저랭때는 칼같이 잘 잡히던 매칭이 빨랭되니까 아니 빨랭도 아니지 7~8랭만 되도 안잡혀

서버통합하고 동접자 2만명이면 뭘해 생존자만 드럽게 많고 살인마들은 다 어디로 갔는지 코빼기도 안보임

한판하는 시간 10분남짓 길면 20분

방 대기시간 평균 10~30분(1랭기준)

편차가 좀 있는게 대기시간 짧으면 1분만에 잡히기도 하고 늦으면 30분이 뭐야 한시간동안 안잡혀본적도 있음

게임 충분히 재밌고 동접이 2만이나 된다는건 멀티하기 충분하고도 남을 정도의 수친데 왜이런거임 도대체

뻘소리를 길게 지껄였지만 게임 재밌으니까 술래잡기 좋아하는 사람은 사도 됀찮음

Legocsmányabb communityvel rendelkező játék amivel valaha játszottam. Nemcsak a gyilkos túlélő mainek ellentétekről szólok, itt még van hogy a survivor is a survivor ellen van, hogy csak ő meneküljön meg. Meg a csalók, de azok hol nincsenek?  Úgyhogy készülj, hogy reportolgatnak majd mint a huzat csak mert szerintük az úgy van, survivornak elég annyit mondanod hogy bodyblocker utána már neked esik minden ok nélkül, hogy paraszt vagy meg stb aztán egy full csapat reportol, csak mert. Van kivétel, jó arcok is vannak sokan, csak épp az nem annyira feltünő. Plusz bónusz, egyik gyíkfing telespammelte a steam screenshotjaim, hogy camper vagyok. Közösségben utána érdeklődtem, hogy ott van e, hogy azé mégis csak álljon le a kis köcsög és bazd nekem ugrott az egész közösség mikor azt mertem mondani, hogy bodyblocker a gyerek és úgy camperez le engem, hogy semmit nem is csináltam. Na mindegy. A játék jó a közösség meg hát, olyan amilyen. Kerüljétek ha lehet a beszélgetéseket a meccs végén, illetve screenshotoljátok őket ha nektek esnek anyázva, mert akkor valószínű, hogy reportoltak is. És lássuk be, hogy elég aránytalanul van elosztva a report 4 az 1 ellen. Úgyhogy vigyázzatok magatokra ha belevágtok.
